name: UniversalBuyback
description: This contract implements an "universal" buyback contract. It accumulates the reward token, send from fee collectors and/or strategies; converts into the two desired buyback tokens, according to the configured splitting; and burn these amounts.

eventDecorators.name: AnnounceDelayedAction
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeExchange
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeMinimalGulpFactor
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeRewardSplit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeTreasury
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ExecuteDelayedAction
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

functionDecorators.name: gulp
functionDecorators.description: Performs the conversion of the accumulated reward token into the buyback tokens, according to the defined splitting, and burns them.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverLostFunds
functionDecorators.description: Allows the recovery of tokens sent by mistake to this contract, excluding tokens relevant to its operations. The full balance is sent to the treasury address. This is a privileged function.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be recovered.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setExchange
functionDecorators.description: Updates the exchange address used to convert funds. A zero address can be used to temporarily pause conversions. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: setMinimalGulpFactor
functionDecorators.description: Updates the minimal gulp factor which defines the tolerance for gulping when below the average price. Default is 99%, which implies accepting up to 1% below the average price. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardSplit
functionDecorators.description: Updates the split share for the buyback and burn tokens. The sum must add up to 100%. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: setTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Updates the treasury address used to recover lost funds. This is a privileged function.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
